# Pull Request

## Description
Brief description of what this PR does.

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Security improvement
- [ ] Performance improvement

## Related Issues
Fixes #(issue_number)

## Changes Made
- [ ] Updated `main.go` with new functionality
- [ ] Added/updated environment variables
- [ ] Updated documentation (README.md, CLAUDE.md)
- [ ] Added tests or debugging tools
- [ ] Updated security features

## Testing
- [ ] Tested with SQL Server 2019+
- [ ] Tested with SQL Server 2008/2012 (legacy)
- [ ] Tested with Azure SQL Database
- [ ] Tested read-only mode functionality
- [ ] Tested with Claude Desktop integration
- [ ] All existing functionality still works

## Security Checklist
- [ ] No hardcoded credentials or sensitive data
- [ ] Input validation implemented
- [ ] SQL injection protection maintained
- [ ] Secure logging (no sensitive data in logs)
- [ ] TLS encryption properly configured

## Documentation
- [ ] README.md updated if needed
- [ ] CLAUDE.md updated if needed
- [ ] Code comments added for complex logic
- [ ] Configuration examples provided

If this introduces breaking changes, please describe them and provide migration instructions:

## Additional Notes
Any additional information, context, or screenshots that would be helpful for reviewers.
